title: Studio Apartment - Furnished
posting_body: ['Fully Furnished Studio - FREE Utilities', 'Take advantage of our great low rates:', 'Only', '$304.00 per week (ALL Taxes Included)', '2130 South Texas 6, Houston, TX 77077', 'Why Stay With Us?', 'No credit checks', 'FREE utilities & Free Domestic Phone Calls', 'FREE on-site parking', 'Onsite laundry facility', 'Kitchenettes with a Full-Size Refrigerator, Microwave, Two-Top Stove, Kitchen Sink, Plenty of Cabinet Space,', 'Kitchen Table and Chairs', 'Studios also include Full Size Bed, Free high speed Wi-Fi, Mounted LED Television with Cable', 'All Guests Enjoy the Following Amenities:', 'Free In-Room Wi-Fi', 'Mounted Flat Acreen TV with Cable', 'Electric Stovetop & Microwave Oven', 'Free domestic phone', '24-hour coin-op laundry on premise', 'Full Refrigerator & Freezer', 'Rates and availability subject to change.', 'Actual room may vary from those shown.', 'Minimum 7 days length of stay required.', ' All taxes included!!', 'To book your stay, contact', 'show contact info', '.', ' Phone monitored M-F']
